title: Dashboard - Portfolio
body:
Hi, I find it hard to manage my LP portfolio. What I do now is that i keep 0,0001 LP token unstaked so that I can determine the current price of the LP token through a formula on the liquidity page * current value. 

I have 10 different LP tokens staked so it takes some time to determine the current value of my Portfolio. 

What I suggest is that you can create a dashboard. This Dashboard must be an overview of all my Staked (LP) tokens including the estimated value. I would also like to be able to Harvest on this page so that I don't have to scroll through the entire farm page looking for LP tokens worth to be harvest.
author: 0xb68f3a6fE4f74aAe7c31970dc8E3445E422aB65B
